wordpressPage.title: Tumbling Down (Jenga)
wordpressPage.content:
You’ll need a Jenga set for this!

As you play Jenga ask young people

1 – What things happen in your life that make you feel like things are tumbling down?

2 – What or who helps support you or rebuild when things feel like they’re tumbling down?

3 – How does God fit into this? How can God help you in difficult times?

(Suggested bible passage/story: Job)
